org.springframework.data.repository.core.support

接口 MethodLookup

  • 函数接口:
    这是一个函数接口, 因此可用作 lambda 表达式或方法引用的赋值目标。

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface MethodLookup
    Strategy interface providing predicates to resolve a method called on a composite to its implementation method.

    Predicates are ordered by filtering priority and applied individually. If a predicate does not yield any positive match, the next predicate is applied.

    从以下版本开始:
    2.0
    另请参阅:
    RepositoryComposition

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  MethodLookup.InvokedMethod
      Value object representing an invoked Method.
      static interface  MethodLookup.MethodPredicate
      A method predicate to be applied on the MethodLookup.InvokedMethod and method candidate.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default MethodLookup and(MethodLookup other)
      Returns a composed MethodLookup that represents a concatenation of this predicate and another.
      List<MethodLookup.MethodPredicate> getLookups()
      Return an ordered List of MethodLookup.MethodPredicate.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getLookups

        List<MethodLookup.MethodPredicate> getLookups()
        Return an ordered List of MethodLookup.MethodPredicate. Each predicate is applied individually. If any MethodLookup.MethodPredicate matches, the tested candidate Method passes the filter.
        返回:
        List of MethodLookup.MethodPredicate.

      • and

        default MethodLookup and(MethodLookup other)
        Returns a composed MethodLookup that represents a concatenation of this predicate and another. When evaluating the composed method lookup, if this lookup evaluates true, then the other method lookup is not evaluated.
        参数:
        other - must not be null.
        返回:
        the composed MethodLookup.
